exceptions.exn: The reference H was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: apply (WFR nat (fun n m => ~ R (a (S n)) (a n))).
exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type R : relation T WFR : well_founded R a : nat -> T The term "nat" has type "Set" while it is expected to have type "T".
The reference G was not found in the current environment.
The reference m was not found in the current environment.
The reference C was not found in the current environment.

original: intros WFR. unfold decreasing_sequence_property. unfold not. intros. destruct H as [a G]. apply (WFR nat (fun n m => ~ R (a (S n)) (a n))). intro n. destruct (G n) as [m C]. exists m. intro H. apply C. auto.
